messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
How long can the investigator be lost in madness?
1D10 hours
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator when the bout of madness comes to an end?
They return to their senses
You are a helpful assistant.
How does the Keeper summarize the time the investigator is lost in madness?
By simply describing the unfamiliar place
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator's memory after the bout of madness ends?
They have no memory of where they have been or what they have done
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does temporary insanity last in Call of Cthulhu?
1D10 hours
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does temporary insanity typically last?
1D10 hours
You are a helpful assistant.
What determines the nature of a bout of madness in Call of Cthulhu?
Either roll on Table VIII: Bouts of Madness—Summary or the Keeper may choose an appropriate option.
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does indefinite insanity typically last in a Call of Cthulhu scenario or chapter?
The duration of the scenario or chapter
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator's behavior after recovering from a bout of madness?
They return to normal behavior, only occasionally presenting their insanity outwardly.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of the investigator's paranoia after recovering from madness?
They constantly check the street for cars.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of the investigator's paranoia?
They disassemble the telephone, looking for bugs.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an example of the investigator's phobia after recovering from madness?
They are afraid of a draught of cool air.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the title of the chapter that provides further advice on roleplaying insane characters?
Chapter 10: Playing the Game
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of Harvey recovering from his bout of madness?
He rejoins his friends
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of a phobia or mania on an insane investigator?
It takes on a greater significance
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of a phobia or mania on a sane investigator?
It acts solely as a roleplaying trait
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to claustrophobia when the investigator is sane?
The phobia won't prevent the investigator from crawling through dark tunnels.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the investigator is insane and exposed to the source of a phobia?
The phobia causes panic.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the penalty for actions other than fighting or fleeing for phobias?
One penalty die.
You are a helpful assistant.
Does the penalty die apply to Sanity rolls or reality check rolls?
No, it does not apply to Sanity rolls or reality check rolls.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of direct exposure to the subject of a phobia?
Causes panic
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of exposure to the source of a mania?
Causes an obsessive reaction
You are a helpful assistant.
How does being exposed to the subject of a phobia affect Sanity rolls?
No penalty applies
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator when being exposed to the subject of their mania?
Causes an overwhelming response
